Name.description: The name of the use case.

Description.description: The description of the use case.

Instructions.description: Instructions of use for the use case

Metadata.description: Metadata info for the use case

Active.description: A value indicating whether the use case is active or not.

Type.description: The type of the use case.

StreamingEnabled.description: Indicates if the streaming is enabled for the use case.

Image.description: The image file for the use case.

DeploymentId.description: The deployment identifier for the use case.

ChunkSize.description: Size of the chunks for generate embeddings

IsEditable.description: A value indicating whether the use case is editable or not.
